title: Outlier Detection in Bayesian Neural Networks: Exploring Pre-activations and Predictive Entropy
details: H Ellingsen, A Hubin, F Remonato, S Sæbø - 2024
abstract: Describing uncertainty is one of the major issues in modern deep learning. Artificial Intelligence models could be used with greater confidence by having solid methods for identifying and quantifying uncertainty. This article proposes two alternative …
